title: Three bean salad
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin black beans, drained', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained', '1 green pepper, diced', '1 large red onion, diced', '1 bunch fresh coriander, chopped', '1 celery stalk, diced', '2 tablespoons Italian-style salad dressing', '1 lemon, juiced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
